title: CMSO-transducing tree-like graph decompositions
authors:
Rutger Campbell, Bruno Guillon, Mamadou Moustapha Kant\'e, Eun Jung
  Kim and Noleen K\"ohler
abstract:
We show that given a graph G we can CMSO-transduce its modular decomposition,
its split decomposition and its bi-join decomposition. This improves results by
Courcelle [Logical Methods in Computer Science, 2006] who gave such
transductions using order-invariant MSO, a strictly more expressive logic than
CMSO. Our methods more generally yield C2MSO-transductions of the canonical
decomposition of weakly-partitive set systems and weakly-bipartitive systems of
bipartitions.
subjects: Computer Science/Formal Languages and Automata Theory
